hackathon-description-text: Cupertino's Teen Commission together with the Cupertino Recreation Department is hosting <hack> Cupertino, a 13-hour overnight hackathon designed to solve a problem presented during our Opening Ceremony. What makes our hackathon unique is that the winning team has the potential for their idea to be presented to City Council.

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Santa Clara County Behavioral Health Services

hackathon-requirements: Submissions must be created DURING the hackathon and must address the prompt given at the hackathon.
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=10185 N Stelling Rd, Cupertino, CA 95014, USA
hackathon-location-address: 10185 N Stelling Rd, Cupertino, CA 95014, USA
hackathon-description-header: A 13-hour overnight hackathon designed to solve a problem relevant to the City of Cupertino
